testcase.name: User Fill the form
testcase.system-out: Then User Click and select "ERP Admin" into Approver field..................passed Then User Click and select "Trust Bank" into Bank Name field................passed Then User enter "112233445" into Account Number field.......................passed Then User Click and select "SOD" into Account Type field....................passed Then User enters "Mohakhali, Dhaka" into Branch name field..................passed Then User enters "112233446" into Account Routing Number field..............passed Then User enters "Dhaka" into Branch Head Destination field.................passed Then User enters "Mohakhali, Dhaka" into Branch Address field...............passed Then User enters "01788888888" into Phone Number field......................passed Then User enters "asif@gmail.com" into Email field..........................passed Then Click Submit button of Create Account..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify The Created Status
